testsuite.name: com.reliaquest.api.controller.AuthControllerTest

testcase.name: Registration - should return bad request when registration fails
Registration - should return error when user already exists
Login - should return 500 when credentials are invalid
Login - should return 500 when user is disabled
Registration - should return forbidden when admin key is missing
Registration - should register new user when not existing and return success
Registration - should return forbidden when admin key is invalid
Login - should return JWT token when credentials are valid
